trans-unit.source: PowerShell Remoting Security Considerations
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 远程处理安全注意事项

trans-unit.source: PowerShell Remoting is the recommended way to manage Windows systems.
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 远程处理是管理 Windows 系统的推荐方式。

trans-unit.source: PowerShell Remoting is enabled by default in Windows Server 2012 R2.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows Server 2012 R2 中，默认启用 PowerShell 远程处理。

trans-unit.source: This document covers security concerns,
trans-unit.target: 本文档介绍了使用 PowerShell 远程处理时的安全问题、

trans-unit.source: recommendations, and best practices when using PowerShell Remoting.
trans-unit.target: 建议以及最佳实践。

trans-unit.source: What is PowerShell Remoting?
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 远程处理是什么？

trans-unit.source: PowerShell Remoting uses [Windows Remote Management (WinRM)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa384426.aspx), which is the Microsoft implementation of the
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 远程处理使用 [Windows 远程管理 (WinRM)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa384426.aspx)，这是

trans-unit.source: [Web Services for Managment (WS-Managment)](http://www.dmtf.org/sites/default/files/standards/documents/DSP0226_1.2.0.pdf) protocol, to allow users to run PowerShell commands on remote
trans-unit.target: [Web 服务管理 (WS-Managment)](http://www.dmtf.org/sites/default/files/standards/documents/DSP0226_1.2.0.pdf) 协议的 Microsoft 实现，允许用户在

trans-unit.source: computers.
trans-unit.target: 远程计算机上运行 PowerShell 命令。

trans-unit.source: You can find more information about using PowerShell Remoting at [Running Remote Commands](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd819505.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 你可以在[运行远程命令](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd819505.aspx)处找到有关使用 PowerShell 远程处理的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: PowerShell Remoting is not the same as using the **ComputerName** parameter of a cmdlet to run it on a remote computer, which uses Remote Procedure Call (RPC)
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 远程处理不同于使用 cmdlet 的 **ComputerName** 参数在远程计算机上运行它，而是使用远程过程调用 (RPC)

trans-unit.source: as its underlying protocol.
trans-unit.target: 做为其基础协议。

trans-unit.source: PowerShell Remoting default settings
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 远程处理默认设置

trans-unit.source: PowerShell Remoting (and WinRM) listen on the following ports:
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 远程处理（和 WinRM）侦听以下端口：

trans-unit.source: By default, PowerShell Remoting only allows connections from members of the Administrator's group.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，PowerShell 远程处理仅允许来自管理员组成员的连接。

trans-unit.source: Sessions are launched under the user's context, so all operating
trans-unit.target: 会话在用户上下文中启动，因此所有

trans-unit.source: system access controls applied to individual users and groups continue to apply to them while connected over PowerShell Remoting.
trans-unit.target: 应用到单个用户和组的操作系统访问控件将在通过 PowerShell 远程处理连接时继续应用到它们。

trans-unit.source: On private networks, the default Windows Firewall rule for PowerShell Remoting accepts all connections.
trans-unit.target: 在专用网络上，默认的 PowerShell 远程处理 Windows 防火墙规则接受所有连接。

trans-unit.source: On public networks, the default Windows Firewall rule allows PowerShell
trans-unit.target: 在公用网络上，默认 Windows 防火墙规则仅允许来自同一子网内的 PowerShell

trans-unit.source: Remoting connections only from within the same subnet.
trans-unit.target: 远程处理连接。

trans-unit.source: You have to explicitly change that rule to open PowerShell Remoting to all connections on a public network.
trans-unit.target: 必须明确地更改该规则，以将 PowerShell 远程处理打开到公用网络上的所有连接。

trans-unit.source: **Warning:** The firewall rule for public networks is meant to protect the computer from potentially malicious external connection attempts.
trans-unit.target: **警告：**公用网络的防火墙规则旨在保护计算机免于潜在的恶意外部连接尝试。

trans-unit.source: Use caution when removing
trans-unit.target: 在删除

trans-unit.source: this rule.
trans-unit.target: 此规则时务必保持谨慎。

trans-unit.source: Process isolation
trans-unit.target: 进程隔离

trans-unit.source: PowerShell Remoting uses [Windows Remote Management (WinRM)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa384426) for communication between computers.
trans-unit.target: PowerShell 远程处理使用 [Windows 远程管理 (WinRM)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa384426)来实现计算机之间的通信。

trans-unit.source: WinRM runs as a service under the Network Service account, and spawns isolated processes running as user accounts to host PowerShell instances.
trans-unit.target: WinRM 作为网络服务帐户下的服务运行，并生成以用户帐户运行的隔离进程以托管 PowerShell 实例。

trans-unit.source: An instance of PowerShell running as one
trans-unit.target: 作为整体运行的 PowerShell 实例

trans-unit.source: user has no access to a process running an instance of PowerShell as another user.
trans-unit.target: 用户不具有访问以其他用户身份运行 PowerShell 实例的进程的权限。

trans-unit.source: Encryption and transport protocols
trans-unit.target: 加密和传输协议

trans-unit.source: It is helpful to consider the security of a PowerShell Remoting connection security from two perspectives: initial authentication, and ongoing communication.
trans-unit.target: 从两个角度考虑 PowerShell 远程处理连接安全的安全性将很有帮助：初始身份验证和正在进行的通信。

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the transport protocol used (HTTP or HTTPS), PowerShell Remoting always encrypts all communication after initial authentication with a per-session AES-256 symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: 无论使用哪种传输协议（HTTP 或 HTTPS），在使用每会话 AES-256 对称密钥完成初始身份验证后，PowerShell 远程处理将始终加密所有的通信。

trans-unit.source: Initial authentication
trans-unit.target: 初始身份验证

trans-unit.source: Authentication confirms the identity of the client to the server - and ideally - the server to the client.
trans-unit.target: 身份验证确认客户端到服务器（理想情况下，从服务器到客户端）的身份。

trans-unit.source: When a client connects to a domain server using its computer name (i.e.: server01, or server01.contoso.com), the default authentication protocol is
trans-unit.target: 当客户端连接到使用其计算机名称的域服务器（即：server01 或 server01.contoso.com）时，默认的身份验证协议为

trans-unit.source: [Kerberos](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa378747.aspx).
trans-unit.target: [Kerberos](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa378747.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: Kerberos guarantees both the user identity and server identity without sending any sort of reusable credential.
trans-unit.target: Kerberos 保证用户标识和服务器标识，而不发送任何种类的可重用的凭据。

trans-unit.source: When a client connects to a domain server using its IP address, or connects to a workgroup server, Kerberos authentication is not possible.
trans-unit.target: 当客户端使用其 IP 地址连接到域服务器，或连接到工作组服务器时，不能进行 Kerberos 身份验证。

trans-unit.source: In that case, PowerShell
trans-unit.target: 在这种情况下，PowerShell

trans-unit.source: remoting relies on the [NTLM authentication protocol](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa378749.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 远程处理依赖于 [NTLM 身份验证协议](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/aa378749.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: The NTLM authentication
trans-unit.target: NTLM 身份验证：

trans-unit.source: protocol guarantees the user identity without sending any sort of delegable credential.
trans-unit.target: 保证用户标识，而不发送任何种类的委托证书的协议。

trans-unit.source: To prove user identity, the NTLM protocol requires that both the client
trans-unit.target: 为了证明用户标识，NTLM 协议要求客户端

trans-unit.source: and server compute a session key from the user's password without ever exchanging the password itself.
trans-unit.target: 和服务器从用户的密码计算会话密钥，而无需自行交换密码。

trans-unit.source: The server typically does not know the user's password, so it communicates with
trans-unit.target: 服务器通常不知道用户的密码，因此它与

trans-unit.source: the domain controller, which does know the user's password and calculates the session key for the server.
trans-unit.target: 知道用户密码的域控制器通信并为服务器计算会话密钥。

trans-unit.source: The NTLM protocol does not, however, guarantee server identity.
trans-unit.target: 但 NTLM 协议不能保证服务器标识。

trans-unit.source: As with all protocols that use NTLM for authentication, an attacker with access to a domain-joined computer's machine
trans-unit.target: 如同所有使用 NTLM 进行身份验证的协议一样，有权访问计算机帐户（已加入域的计算机）的攻击者

trans-unit.source: account could invoke the domain controller to compute an NTLM session-key and thereby impersonate the server.
trans-unit.target: 可以调用域控制器来计算 NTLM 会话密钥，从而模拟服务器。

trans-unit.source: NTLM-based authentication is disabled by default, but may be permitted by either configuring SSL on the target server, or by configuring the WinRM TrustedHosts setting.
trans-unit.target: 默认禁用基于 NTLM 的身份验证，但是可以通过配置目标服务器上的 SSL 或配置 WinRM TrustedHosts 设置而允许使用。

trans-unit.source: Using SSL certificates to validate server identity during NTLM-based connections
trans-unit.target: 使用 SSL 证书以在基于 NTLM 的连接过程中验证服务器标识

trans-unit.source: Since the NTLM authentication protocol cannot ensure the identity of the target server (only that it already knows your password), you can configure target servers
trans-unit.target: 由于 NTLM 身份验证协议不能确保目标服务器的标识（除非它已知道你的密码），你可以配置目标服务器

trans-unit.source: to use SSL for PowerShell Remoting.
trans-unit.target: 使用适用于 PowerShell 远程处理的 SSL。

trans-unit.source: Assigning a SSL certificate to the target server (if issued by a Certificate Authority that the client also trusts) enables
trans-unit.target: 会启用“将 SSL 证书分配到目标服务器（如果由客户端也信任的证书颁发机构颁发）”

trans-unit.source: NTLM-based authentication that guarantees both the user identity and server identity.
trans-unit.target: 确保用户和服务器标识的基于 NTLM 的身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Ignoring NTLM-based server identity errors
trans-unit.target: 忽略基于 NTLM 的服务器标识错误

trans-unit.source: If deploying a SSL certificate to a server for NTLM connections is infeasible, you may suppress the resulting identity errors by adding the server to the WinRM
trans-unit.target: 如果将 SSL 证书部署到用于 NTLM 连接的服务器不可行，则可以通过将服务器添加到 WinRM

trans-unit.source: **TrustedHosts** list.
trans-unit.target: **TrustedHosts** 列表来取消生成的标识错误。

trans-unit.source: Please note that adding a server name to the TrustedHosts list should not be considered as any form of statement of the trustworthiness of
trans-unit.target: 请注意，添加服务器名称到 TrustedHosts 列表不应被视为任何形式的主机本身的可信度陈述，

trans-unit.source: the hosts themselves - as the NTLM authentication protocol cannot guarantee that you are in fact connecting to the host you are intending to connect to.
trans-unit.target: 因为 NTLM 身份验证协议不能确保你实际上正在连接到你想要连接的主机。

trans-unit.source: Instead, you should consider the TrustedHosts setting to be the list of hosts for which you wish to suppress the error generated by being unable to verify the server's identity.
trans-unit.target: 相反，应将 TrustedHosts 设置视为你想为其取消因无法验证服务器标识而生成的错误的主机列表。

trans-unit.source: Ongoing Communication
trans-unit.target: 正在进行的通信

trans-unit.source: Once initial authentication is complete, the [PowerShell Remoting Protocol](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd357801.aspx) encrypts all ongoing communication
trans-unit.target: 初始身份验证完成后，[PowerShell 远程处理协议](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/dd357801.aspx)会使用每会话 AES-256 对称密钥

trans-unit.source: with a per-session AES-256 symmetric key.
trans-unit.target: 对所有正在进行的通信进行加密。

trans-unit.source: Making the second hop
trans-unit.target: 形成第二个跃点

trans-unit.source: By default, PowerShell Remoting uses Kerberos (if available) or NTLM for authentication.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，PowerShell 远程处理使用 Kerberos（如果可用）或者 NTLM 进行身份验证。

trans-unit.source: Both of these protocols authenticate to the remote machine without sending credentials to it.
trans-unit.target: 这两种协议对远程计算机进行身份验证而无需向其发送凭据。

trans-unit.source: This is the most secure way to authenticate, but because the remote machine does not have the user's credentials, it cannot access other computers and services on the user's behalf.
trans-unit.target: 这是进行身份验证最安全的方式，但由于远程计算机没有用户的凭据，因此它不能以该用户的名义访问其他计算机和服务。

trans-unit.source: This is known as the "Double-Hop" problem.
trans-unit.target: 这被称为“双跃点”问题。

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to avoid this problem:
trans-unit.target: 有几种方法可以避免此问题：

trans-unit.source: Kerberos Constrained Delegation
trans-unit.target: Kerberos 约束委派

trans-unit.source: For highly trusted servers, you can enable [Kerberos Constrained Delegation](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc995228.aspx).
trans-unit.target: 对于高度受信任的服务器，可以启用 [Kerberos 约束委派](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc995228.aspx)。

trans-unit.source: This allows the remote server to impersonate the
trans-unit.target: 这允许远程服务器将

trans-unit.source: authenticated user to a specified list of computers and services.
trans-unit.target: 经身份验证的用户模拟到指定计算机和服务列表。

trans-unit.source: Trust between remote computers
trans-unit.target: 远程计算机之间的信任

trans-unit.source: If you trust users connected remotely to *Server1* to resources on *Server2*, you can explicitly grant *Server1* access to those resources.
trans-unit.target: 如果你信任远程连接到 *Server1* 的用户访问 *Server2* 上的资源，则可以显式授予 *Server1* 对这些资源的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Use explicit credentials when accessing remote resources
trans-unit.target: 访问远程资源时使用显式凭据

trans-unit.source: You can explicitly pass your credentials to a remote resource by using the **Credential** parameter of a cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 通过使用 cmdlet 的 **Credential** 参数，可以将凭据显式传递到远程资源。

trans-unit.source: For example:
trans-unit.target: 例如：

trans-unit.source: CredSSP
trans-unit.target: CredSSP

trans-unit.source: You can use the [Credential Security Support Provicer (CredSSP)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/bb931352.aspx) for authentication (by specifying "CredSSP" as the
trans-unit.target: 可以使用[凭据安全支持提供程序(CredSSP)](https://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/windows/desktop/bb931352.aspx) 进行身份验证（通过将“CredSSP”指定为

trans-unit.source: value of the `Authentication` parameter of a call to the [New-PSSession](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh849717.aspx) cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 对 [New-PSSession](https://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/hh849717.aspx) cmdlet 的一个调用的 `Authentication` 参数值。

trans-unit.source: CredSSP passes credentials in plain text to the server,
trans-unit.target: CredSSP 将凭据以纯文本的形式传递给服务器，

trans-unit.source: so using it opens you up to credential theft attacks.
trans-unit.target: 因此，使用它会给你带来凭据被盗攻击的风险。

trans-unit.source: If the remote computer is compromised, the attacker has access to the user's credentials.
trans-unit.target: 如果远程计算机被攻破，攻击者将有权访问用户的凭据。

trans-unit.source: CredSSP is disabled by default on both client and
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，CredSSP 在客户端和

trans-unit.source: server computers.
trans-unit.target: 服务器计算机上都处于禁用状态。

trans-unit.source: You should enable CredSSP only in the most trusted environments.
trans-unit.target: 应该仅在最受信任的环境中启用 CredSSP。

trans-unit.source: For example, a domain administrator connecting to a domain controller because the domain controller is
trans-unit.target: 例如，连接到域控制器的域管理员，因为域控制器是

trans-unit.source: highly trusted.
trans-unit.target: 高度受信任的。

trans-unit.source: For more information about security concerns when using CredSSP for PowerShell Remoting, see
trans-unit.target: 有关使用用于 PowerShell 远程处理的 CredSSP 时的安全问题的详细信息，请参阅

trans-unit.source: [Accidental Sabotage: Beware of CredSSP](http://www.powershellmagazine.com/2014/03/06/accidental-sabotage-beware-of-credssp).
trans-unit.target: [意外破坏：注意 CredSSP](http://www.powershellmagazine.com/2014/03/06/accidental-sabotage-beware-of-credssp)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about credential theft attacks, see [Mitigating Pass-the-Hash (PtH) Attacks and Other Credential Theft](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=36036).
trans-unit.target: 有关凭据被盗攻击的详细信息，请参阅[缓解哈希传递 (PtH) 攻击和其他凭据被盗](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=36036)。
